channel.title: Can someone help me with jarring client?
channel.description: well i jar client, set main class : client and than it create jar, all works but when i try to connect to server says error, it says port is none :\ any1 got idea how to set it so it works? (cause port is set in 2 files "client.java + class42_sub1.java) and main-class can be just 1 file ;\;\;\ can any1 tell me how to jar my client to make it set port to 43594 cause i see just null
